tool_description: Checks current inventory levels, turnover rates, and stock movement patterns to inform promotional pricing decisions and clearance strategies.

product_ids.description: List of product IDs to check inventory for

include_turnover_analysis.description: Whether to include inventory turnover analysis

error_messages: Invalid product ID: One or more product IDs are not found in inventory system.
Invalid warehouse location: One or more warehouse locations are not recognized.
Inventory system unavailable: Cannot connect to inventory management system.
Insufficient historical data: Not enough data to calculate meaningful turnover rates.
usage: Provide product_ids to check inventory levels. Optionally specify warehouse_locations and enable turnover analysis. Returns current stock levels and movement patterns.

current_stock_levels.description: Current stock quantities for each product

stock_status.description: Stock status for each product: low, medium, high, overstock

turnover_rates.description: Inventory turnover rates per product (times per year)

clearance_candidates.description: Product IDs that may benefit from clearance pricing
